name: Kubelet Ping
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Kubelet doesn't respond to Ping. OK, otherwise

name: Kubelet Docker Service
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Docker service doesn't run on the Kubelet. OK, otherwise

name: Kubelet Syncloop
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the syncloop health check is down. OK, otherwise

name: Kubelet Health
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the overall Kubelet health check is down. OK, otherwise
